statements: DELETE FROM HighThroughputScreeningResults WHERE screening_result = TRUE;
DELETE FROM HighThroughputScreeningResults WHERE screening_id = 10 AND assay_type = 'Inhibitor';
DELETE FROM HighThroughputScreeningResults WHERE compound_name = 'Caffeine' AND screening_result = false;
DELETE FROM DrugDiscoveryResults WHERE target_protein = 'ABC Protein';
DELETE FROM HighThroughputScreeningResults WHERE assay_result < 0.5 AND compound_id = 100;
DELETE FROM DrugDiscoveryResults WHERE target_protein = 'Enzyme X' AND discovery_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM high_throughput_results WHERE experiment_id = 1 AND compound_id = 5 AND assay_id = 10;
DELETE FROM screening_results WHERE compound_name = 'Example Compound';
